We saw the first Predator use one: at the start of the fi THE HATCH SLIDES DOWN, eclipses her from view

dialogues.speaker: -- RORY
dialogues.text: On it. Knows what to do, GRABS the control yoke, and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IT SWIVELS IN PLACE like a cannon, lining up, AIMING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CASEY sees a red button, SLAMS it, and WHOOOOSH--! LAUNCHES HERSELF. The pod goes airborne --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It tumbles... SLAMS DOWN! Traverses the length of the str INSIDE: CASEY’S JOLTED, SCREAMING, AS -- OUTSIDE: THE HYBRIDS watch the pod SCREAM PAST them, hesitate with confusion. That’s when WE SEE:  118. Tiny red LEDs on their collars are BLINKING... And now? One by one, before our eyes, THE HYBRIDS EXPLODE AS THE SPACECRAFT SKIDS PAST THEM -- like a string of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McKenna sees the sky behind them LIGHT UP from the detona hybrids. But his exhilaration is cut short as he notices: THE DEAD HYBRID on the top of the APC -- The LED on its collar is blinking now. Oh, shit. The TWO PREDATORS RAISE their wrist gauntlets -- THOOK! THOOK! LAUNCHING GRAPPLING HOOKS! Yank the corpse UP --

dialogues.speaker: AND HEAVE IT OFF THE APC
dialogues.text: Like fishermen throwing a marlin back into the ocean. Williams puts the pedal to the metal: BA-WHOOM!! THE HYBRID EXPLODES, mid-air. At which point, not to be outdone -- Williams promptly CRASHES.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: The APC PLOWS through chainlink, THROWING McKenna and the Predators off... and meanwhile, back at the ranch --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hatch POPS OPEN... Casey half-crawls, half-TUMBLES out. Looks up, sweaty, feral -- ONE HYBRID LEFT. A weird, SATANIC looking thing, rushing straight at her -- It comes in range of the signal. BLOWS. She dives for COVER behind the pod. Bits of PREDATOR- THING, raining. A dismembered TORSO arcs down. Hits the tarmac. Turns to her, STILL ALIVE, REACHING -- She rips out its spine.  119. The SNIFFER lopes up beside her. A proud hunting dog... admiring its Huntress. An image to remember.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McKENNA and WILLIAMS, sprawled. Groggy. Ten yard-line of a high school FOOTBALL FIELD. Williams nods downrange:

dialogues.speaker: THE ARK IS DOWN
dialogues.text: Just past the fifty yard-line. Imbedded in the turf. AND THERE’S RORY Limping from the ship. Disoriented. McKenna starts toward him. His expression suggests that o he has the boy in his arms, he’s not likely to let go. At which point, the “DEFECTOR” PREDATORS RISE SLOWLY, throatily CLICKING... Grab their WEAPONS. Then? Everything goes to hell. Striding across the field THE UPGRADE. Big as life. Raises the GAUNTLET. Promptly spikes an ION BLAST through each of the smaller Predators; DISINTEGRATING them -- He BELLOWS victory: Mission Accomplished. Then PIVOTS. Mandibles twitching -- walks toward ITS CLOSEST REMAINING FOE, human or alien: The kid. The loser. “Ass Burger.” The Predator SCOOPS HIM UP in one hand -- regards him clinically, with something akin to... RESPECT? Turns, now And enters the downed spaceship. With Rory.

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: The HATCH SLAMS SHUT. McKenna stares in disbelief... then starts after them, the FULL meaning of this hitting him -- His son figured out how to fly the Ark; how to kill the hybrids. So what does that mean to the Upgrade? Only this RORY IS ITS MOST EVOLVED OPPONENT.  120.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Predator roughly TOSSES RORY INTO IT for safe keep Screens BLINK to life; a deep BASS RUMBLE is heard as the ship POWERS UP for departure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the spacecraft’s engines RUMBLE, and -- HE VAULTS up the bleacher steps--! Williams sees this. Trades a glance with Flyboy. They exchange “fuck it” shrugs, and HAUL ASS after him --

dialogues.speaker: THE ARK RISES
dialogues.text: Plasma exhaust SPEWING, as McKenna SCRAMBLES up bleachers THE ARK, now fifteen feet below the top of the stadium... MCKENNA doesn’t slow. Runs, LAUNCHES into the air -- Touches down, WHACK--! ON TOP OF THE SHIP. He yelps in pain. ANKLE, twisted, and meanwhile --

dialogues.speaker: WILLIAMS AND FLYBOY, MORE SENSIBLE
dialogues.text: Stand, looking down at him. Patiently wait as the top of the ship RISES EVEN WITH THEM -- STEP ON, like stepping onto an escalator. McKenna shoots them a withering look. That’s when the ship TURNS, throwing the three men off balance. THEY SCRAMBLE to find handholds --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOCAL POLICE CARS, screaming into view, flashers turning. A MOTORCYCLE COP looks up, stunned. SEEING:

dialogues.speaker: THE ARK RISING
dialogues.text: Over the treeline. He GRABS for his lapel mike -- but that’s the same moment handgun is LIBERATED FROM ITS HOLSTER, and he WHIRLS TO: CASEY, aiming his own sidearm at him.

dialogues.speaker: MOTORCYCLE COP
dialogues.text: You don’t want to do this, lady.  121.

dialogues.speaker: CASEY
dialogues.text: There’s a lot of shit I don’t wanna do, Ponch. She mounts his Harley, ROARS OFF after the Predator ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just in time for OUR VERTIGO SHOT -- as the ship ascends with our three soldiers hanging precariously. McKenna’s backpack SLIDES away -- He flails at it, the Predator weapons disgorging, tumbling earthward, fuck -- He hauls it in, secures it. Cups his ear, the one with th BLUETOOTH inside. YELLS into the com over the RUSHING WIN

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: Rory, I’m on top of the ship!! Are you okay?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safe in his coffin-like tube, Rory is shocked to hear his Dad. Puts his hand over his mouth so the Predator won’t h

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: Mom was right. You are crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CASEY’s stolen chopper ROARS in pursuit of the spaceship. sees something by the side of the road, BRAKES abruptly-- The items that fell from the ship. Dented, scarred: A Predator BIOHELMET. A few feet beyond it, A CLOAKING BALL. Like the one McKenna used in Cuba.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mid-air, Williams looks up, blanches. POINTS:

dialogues.speaker: WILLIAMS
dialogues.text: Uh-oh. On your six, chief! McKenna squints, seeing something on the horizon. Scratch that: TWO THINGS, on the horizon:

dialogues.speaker: F-22 RAPTOR STEALTH FIGHTERS
dialogues.text: Closing fast. The ones Woodhurst scrambled. A SIDEWINDER LAUNCHES from one of them, AND --  122.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RORY, tense, peers from hiding at

dialogues.speaker: A MONITOR
dialogues.text: depicting the incoming air-to-air missile. Then a blinkin DOTTED LINE begins to form, surrounding the ship. Rory ta his Bluetooth, FRANTIC:

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: Dad?? There’s a force field going online -- automatic!

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Um -- say again?

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: Just... JUMP! STRAIGHT UP, NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No time to argue, McKenna YELLS THE ORDER to his men:

dialogues.speaker: JUMP--
dialogues.text: What happens next, happens quickly. The force field DOES engage, but first, THREE THINGS: 1) McKENNA attempts to jump. STUMBLES. Falls FLAT. 2) WILLIAMS? He does jump. Straight UP, in fact. 3) FLYBOY, alas, does neither. He FREEZES, caught out, as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE INVISIBLE FORCE FIELDS BLASTS ON with an ionized CRAC Now, let’s tally the result. First off -- MCKENNA is lying UNDER the field, which is just above him A LOCK OF HIS HAIR feathers down, clipped.

dialogues.speaker: NEBRASKA
dialogues.text: COMES DOWN, boots first, ON TOP of the force shield! Standing in mid-aid. Surreal. But sadly:

dialogues.speaker: CONFUSED FLYBOY
dialogues.text: has been cut off at the knees. SEVERED, he topples away. His last flight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hanging on for dear life. Lies splayed, palms flat, separ from McKenna only by the force shield. Without it, they’d on TOP of each other.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: BLASTS OVERHEAD: a MISS. Passes them and RIPS FORWARD int

dialogues.speaker: THE TREES AHEAD
dialogues.text: Vanishes. Pause... DETONATION. Tower of FLAME. They’re going to pass right through it. McKenna, breathless, under the shields. Protected. Nebraska, not so much. They face each other through the barrier. Lock eyes; inches apart a moment before: NEBRASKA IS BURNED AWAY, flames engulfing the spacecraft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SECOND PILOT adjusts his HUD. LOCKS ON the Predator A

dialogues.speaker: F-22 PILOT
dialogues.text: Two five-six, bogey’s in my sights, fangs out. Lighting up ‘winders... AN ALARM PIERCES: something’s wrong. The PILOT looks to his radar, shit, he’s being painted, as --

dialogues.speaker: THE PREDATOR SHIP, RETALIATING
dialogues.text: Hell, yeah. From the craft, an energy bolt LANCES UPWARD. Mere feet in front of McKenna, nearly INCINERATES him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PILOT engages the ejection handle, and -- FWOOSH! Pilot and seat both ROCKET AWAY AS -- The ship DISSOLVES into flame beneath him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEEING the jet go to PIECES, high overhead. He looks around, desperation mounting. Has a nutty idea. He draws a gun, grips it tightly. Galvanizes, and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROLLS toward the edge, not stopping -- tumbles off the sh OVER THE FUCKING EDGE! We think it’s suicide. But nope: As long as he’s inside the shield, he can RIDE the fucker Which he DOES. Slewing. Tumbling down an invisible slide. CLUD--! Fetches to a stop. UNDERNEATH the craft. Florida blows by beneath him. The only thing that’s got h back, utterly INVISIBLE. He decides not to look down. Fixates OVERHEAD, instead, on: THE EXPOSED SHIP’S BELLY. More specifically--? The EMPTY PORT where an escape pod once nestled. He wrest his way inside, clinging to a strut. Sees a keypad, YELLS

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: RORY! What’s the sequence?? I watched you put it in, TELL ME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rory HEARS this, stammers:

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: To the pod?? I... I can’t remember.

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: Okay, do this -- TRY.

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: I can’t think, it’s mixed up in my head --

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: Dammit, son, I watched you! It was one, two, then over three, up two... McKenna stops. Blinks. MCKENNA (CONT’ D) Holy shit. I fucking KNOW it. He begins frantically stabbing away at the entry pad. MCKENNA (CONT’ D) Rory? You know how I always said be a big boy?

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: Yeah?  125.

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: Screw it. Make yourself small, kid. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: DOWN
dialogues.text: The hatch slides back -- McKenna UNLOADS, shot after shot. Targeting any BLINKING LIGHTS. BLAZES AWAY. Teeth bared, fearsome --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship SHUDDERS violently as -- THE PREDATOR whips around in his seat, ALARM KLAXONS PEALING. Registers the OPEN DOOR; a visitor. Doesn’t miss beat. Raises an arm, FIRES -- McKENNA, BLOWN BACKWARD THE BLAST knocks him loose. Sends him TUMBLING backward into open air -- And we say “open air” because even as the energy shield catches him, high over Florida, we can see it’s FLICKERING. Like a bulb before it goes out -- And then, it goes out. McKENNA DROPS. Like a stone, even as

dialogues.speaker: THE PREDATOR ARK, CRIPPLED
dialogues.text: Begins descending. Pitching, yawing --

dialogues.speaker: ALSO DESCENDING
dialogues.text: But faster. PLUMMETING, a thousand feet in the air. SEES:

dialogues.speaker: A LONE PARACHUTE
dialogues.text: Billowing. THE EJECTED PILOT from the first F-22. MCKENNA ADJUSTS COURSE in mid-air; SLAMS into the guy, an -- GRABS HOLD, breaking his fall, as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PIERCES the trees, SKIMS ACROSS brackish water -- HURTLES INTO a fallen willow, CRACK--!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The VIEW PORT explodes outward. Predator, EJECTED..!  126. Exits, pinwheels through space... Disappears into the BOG. Vanishes, submerged. The ship subsides, comes to rest in...

dialogues.speaker: THE SWAMP
dialogues.text: Primitive. Primordial. What the world was like before the dinosaurs. Silence...

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA, NOW
dialogues.text: CRASHES DOWN--! Through the branches. Breaking ribs, tearing skin. Tossed like a rag doll, until --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He JERKS TO A HALT, hanging in a tree branch twenty feet off the ground. Much like when we met first him. Unconscious PILOT, strapped beside him. McKenna takes stock. Looks down, at

dialogues.speaker: THE MASSIVE FIGURE
dialogues.text: RISING from the swamp. Back hunched; shards peppering its flesh. Rivulets of phosphorescent green blood...

dialogues.speaker: THE UPGRADED PREDATOR
dialogues.text: It’s down to the two of them. McKenna doesn’t waste a second. He’s already unlimbered h sniper rifle and he DOUBLE-TAPS the trigger, puts TWO IN ITS CHEST. And from there..? It never stops.

dialogues.speaker: THE CREATURE
dialogues.text: BELLOWS..! Stumbles back, collides with the downed ARK. P a hand out to STEADY itself, grips the craft -- Mistake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RORY LEAPS to the console. Finds a flickering button, POU it with his tiny fist -- And just like that, triggers the FORCE SHIELDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Predator looks down, goggles --  127. Noting the neatly cauterized STUMP where its forearm was. The limb DROPS AWAY as the Predator looks on, dumbly. McKENNA, MEANWHILE Drops..! ROLLS -- comes up running. BLASTING shots at the creature. Dives behind a tree... And blinks. Because righ in front of him, incongruously: A MOTORCYCLE. Just lying there. He snaps his gaze upward, hearing trees move -- seeing NOTHING -- as, without warning

dialogues.speaker: CASEY, CLOAKING BALL IN HAND
dialogues.text: Shimmers and MATERIALIZES BEFORE OUR EYES. Launches, snarling, from an OVERHEAD TREE BRANCH. Onto the Predator’s shoulders..! She grabs a fistful of DREADLOCKS. SLICES THEM CLEAN OFF- THE PREDATOR STAGGERS and WEAVES. Disoriented. CLAWING blindly at the air. MCKENNA tosses his rifle -- pulls the COMBISTICK -- Here we go. The final flurry:

dialogues.speaker: THE UPGRADE
dialogues.text: SWATS McKENNA aside. CASEY, sent tumbling. Then the Predator SPINS, startled -- struck by THREE BULLETS, as

dialogues.speaker: HOLY FUCK, THE GUY IN THE TREE
dialogues.text: The PILOT, has removed his Sig-Sauer from his nylon vest and, still strapped in, starts RAINING COVER FIRE --

dialogues.speaker: PREDATOR, ONE SWIFT MOVE
dialogues.text: Triggers an ION BLAST. Blows the tree to splinters. Obliterates him. DEBRIS showers down. McKenna, scrambling...

dialogues.speaker: THE PREDATOR
dialogues.text: UNLOADS. Looses a veritable FIRESTORM. Triggers BLAST AFTER BLAST, churning up water, SHREDDING trees -- Our heroes can do nothing but duck and cover.  128. They’re no match. CASEY is blown six feet through the air HITS, rattled, and it’s all over -- heroes, done. EXCEPT: Now, above the din, a SOUND intrudes upon Casey’s consciousness. Subtle at first, she squints -- Now WE hear it -- a heavy PANTING off-camera, as

dialogues.speaker: THE SNIFFER
dialogues.text: PADS INTO VIEW. Something in its mouth. IT DROPS IT at Casey’s feet; an offering. CASEY’S POV: THE SELF-DESTRUCT COLLAR. The one she threw away earlier. It fetched it back. At which point, everything proceeds like a BLUR: Casey, no hesitation. She scoops it up, feverishly accessing buttons on her WRIST GAUNTLET -- Across the clearing, McKENNA sees this, yells: MCKENNA (CONT’D) TOSS IT. She doesn’t ask questions. Slings it. Across the clearing to McKENNA -- who SNAGS it from air, just in time to DIVE Narrowly misses being INCINERATED -- He hits, ROLLS -- comes up in a combat crouch; HAVING RETRIEVED THE PREDATOR’S SEVERED ARM. The one with the arrows. He loops the COLLAR over the double-pronged PROJECTILES. Pivots, AIMS as --

dialogues.speaker: CASEY, ON THE RUN
dialogues.text: Triggers the last two digits in the arming code: The LED BLINKS RED. McKenna FIRES; takes the creature in the leg. IMBEDS. Pause...

dialogues.speaker: THE EXPLOSION
dialogues.text: HURLS THE PREDATOR backward--! Red smoke and flames subsi revealing...  129. A FIFTEEN FOOT CRATER. Smoking. Seething... in the midst of it, the PREDATOR, a bloodied green mess. Writhing... barely alive. McKENNA and CASEY stagger forward, Casey in battle mode

dialogues.speaker: RORY, NOW
dialogues.text: Staggers out of the downed ARK... rushes to his father’s side. They embrace, but McKenna’s eyes never leave the Predator; rifle at the ready. Cautiously, he reaches in his pack. Brings out the TRANSL DEVICE. Keys it...

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: (to The Predator) Who are you..? What are you? The Predator, half-conscious, “answers” with its trademar rattle of TRILLS AND CLICKS. Searching... Searching...

dialogues.speaker: TRANSLATOR
dialogues.text: VOICE “I... warrior.” (beat) “You?” McKenna trades looks at Rory. A shrug. Not resigned, but. maybe a hint of pride?

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: Same. The creature points at RORY.

dialogues.speaker: TRANSLATOR VOICE
dialogues.text: “Warrior... NEW breed.” That’s bizarre. For a moment we’d swear it’s favoring the kid with a FOND LOOK, one of admiration -- Then it GOES for the kid. The last of its strength, LASHES OUT, talons bared --

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: Puts two SHOTS THROUGH ITS EYE. The Predator slumps. Dead. McKenna’s eyes shift to his son, spattered in green blood. Staring.  130.

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: That’s okay. You can shoot him again if you want.

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: I’m good. A COMMOTION, NOW, they turn their gaze skyward, as

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: HUEYS come ratcheting in, CIRCLING the clearing. SOLDIERS, rappelling down through TREE TOPS --

dialogues.speaker: A PLATOON OF U.S. MILITARY
dialogues.text: Touches down, immediately sprinting for the three SURVIVORS, forming a makeshift perimeter --

dialogues.speaker: WE HEAR A FAMILIAR SNORT
dialogues.text: And the slobbering PREDATOR DOG pads into view. Bee-lines to Casey, panting for her favor. EVERY MILITARY WEAPON SWIVELS to draw a bead on it. But like an Amazon warrior, Casey divests the nearest soldier of his weapon. Spins, COCKS IT -- !

dialogues.speaker: CASEY
dialogues.text: You touch my dog and I’11 kill you. One of the soldiers RUNS up to them.

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER AT EXTRACTION SITE
dialogues.text: Lieutenant McKenna? The soldier hands him a cell phone. McKenna puts the phone to his ear, perplexed. Then... a relieved smile, and he hands the phone to his son.

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: (into phone) Mom? EXT. RORY’S HOUSE - DAY (INTERCUT:) EMILY, on the front porch. Clutching a phone:  131.

dialogues.speaker: EMILY
dialogues.text: Are you okay, honey? His answer, drowned out by the ROAR OF A CHOPPER descendi EMILY (CONT’D) What’d you say, peanut? Rory plugs his ears. SHOUTS:

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: Ich liebe auch tou! But still, no good. The helicopter, deafening.

dialogues.speaker: WHAT
dialogues.text: Now the chopper DIES DOWN... just in time for us to hear:

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: I love you. TIME CUT: MINUTES LATER - ON CASEY AND McKENNA Approaching the helicopter.

dialogues.speaker: CASEY
dialogues.text: It’s weird. The file was all about how honorable these things are... (re: upgrade) But this one -- he wasn’t about hunting. No sporting chance, nothing. Just slaughter.

dialogues.speaker: MCKENNA
dialogues.text: You said it yourself, it had human DNA... (smiles sadly) They’ re becoming more like us.

dialogues.speaker: CASEY
dialogues.text: (unsettled) McKenna, did we... did we just start a war? Now, a VOICE from the chopper:

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Negatory. The war’s already started. They both look up as, framed in the hatchway, REVEAL:  “DUTCH” SCHAEFER The Predator’s first adversary. Face haunted;

dialogues.speaker: SCHAEFER
dialogues.text: Dutch Schaefer, U.S. Special Forces. Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: Uh... me, too? Schaefer nods, smiles grimly... says:

dialogues.speaker: SCHAEFER
dialogues.text: Especially you. CUT TO BLACK. CREDITS. 132. etched by pain.
